question: Which of the following are the measures are not part of the Liberalization of Economy in 1991?
option2: Removal of Bureaucratic control over Industries
option4: New Government controlled companies were set up
answer: New Government controlled companies were set up
explanation: The liberalization of the economy in 1991 led to a decrease in government control over the economy. The control of private entities over the economy has increased. FDI was allowed and convertibility of rupee was started.
